title: 清明連續假期(113年4月4 ~7日)調整垃圾清運時間During the consecutive Qingming Festival holiday (April 4 to 7, 2024), the garbage truck removal time will be adjusted.
author: 許智翔
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 總務處環境保護組 - 許智翔 - cocco3746@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03-8906399
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 清明連續假期(113年4月4 ~7日)調整垃圾清運時間During the consecutive Qingming Festival holiday (April 4 to 7, 2024), the garbage truck removal time will be adjusted.
日期： Wed, 27 Mar 2024 10:20:31 +0800
附檔： 時刻表.pdf (81 KB)   
一、 配合清明節連假4月4日(星期四)暫停收取垃圾。
二、 另於4月5日及4月6日(星期五~星期六)加班清運，清運時間及地點如下:12：40 ~ 14：50收取學生宿舍區垃圾，18：00 ~ 19：20調整至學人宿舍區收取垃圾，當日有資源回收車(時刻表如附件)。
三、 停收垃圾期間，請勿將垃圾棄置室外，謝謝配合。

總務處環境保護組 敬啟
1. Garbage collection will be suspended on Tomb Sweeping Day, April 4 (Thursday).
2. Overtime clearing and transportation will be done on April 5th and April 6th (Friday to Saturday). The time and location are as follows:Garbage collection time in the student dormitory area is 12:40~14:50. The garbage collection time in the staff dormitory area has been adjusted to 18:00~19:20. There will be a recycling truck on the day (please see the attachment for the schedule).
3.When the garbage removal service is stopped. Please do not throw trash outdoors. Thank you for your cooperation.
​
Environmental Protection DivisionGeneral Affairs Office
